description:
As a QA engineer
  I want to verify if previously reported bugs have been fixed
  So that we can confirm the fixes

elements.name: Bug #1 - BNE SMS carrier integration fails with 500 Internal Server Error

steps.name: I prepare a standard SMS message request
I set the carrier to "BNE"
I set a valid T-Mobile phone number "+12144352325"
I submit the request to the communication module
the response should have status code 200

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Expected 200 but got 500
    at KredosWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/asliates/Desktop/KredosAI/testing-feature-test_automation_scripts/KredosApplication/automation/tests/steps/Comm_Module/DEV_925_Bug_Verification.ts:206:14)

steps.name: the message should be routed to BNE

elements.name: Bug #2 - Malformed JSON exposes internal stack trace in 500 error

steps.name: I prepare a malformed JSON message request
I submit the invalid request to the communication module
the response should have status code 400
the response should not contain stack trace information

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Stack trace information bug is not fixed
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at KredosWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/asliates/Desktop/KredosAI/testing-feature-test_automation_scripts/KredosApplication/automation/tests/steps/Comm_Module/DEV_925_Bug_Verification.ts:242:12)

elements.name: Bug #3 - Large Message Content Handling (500 Error)

steps.name: I prepare a standard SMS message request
I set the carrier to "TWILIO"
I set a valid phone number
I set message content exceeding 1600 characters
I submit the request to the communication module
the response should have status code 400
the response should indicate message length limit exceeded

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Response should mention message length limits
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at KredosWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/asliates/Desktop/KredosAI/testing-feature-test_automation_scripts/KredosApplication/automation/tests/steps/Comm_Module/DEV_925_Bug_Verification.ts:257:10)

elements.name: Bug #4 - Scheduling Parameter Requirements

steps.name: I prepare a standard SMS message request
I set the carrier to "TWILIO"
I set a valid phone number
I set schedule=true without scheduleAt parameter
I submit the request to the communication module
the response should have status code 400
the response should clearly indicate scheduleAt parameter is required

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Scheduling parameter requirement bug is not fixed
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at KredosWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/asliates/Desktop/KredosAI/testing-feature-test_automation_scripts/KredosApplication/automation/tests/steps/Comm_Module/DEV_925_Bug_Verification.ts:269:12)

elements.name: Bug #5 - Silent Handling of Invalid "tryRCS" Values

steps.name: I prepare a standard message request
I set a valid phone number
I set tryRCS flag to "invalid-value"
I submit the request to the communication module
the response should have status code 400
the response should indicate invalid tryRCS value

description:
As a communication service provider
  I want to use a test mode for Infobip SMS
  So that I can verify the system without sending messages to real customers

elements.name: TC01 - Enable Test Mode via API Parameter

steps.name: Infobip test data for basic test mode with "TC01"
the test mode message is submitted to the communication module
the test mode is active in the response

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Response should indicate test mode is active
    + expected - actual

    -false
    +true

    at KredosWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/asliates/Desktop/KredosAI/testing-feature-test_automation_scripts/KredosApplication/automation/tests/steps/Comm_Module/DEV_928/DEV_928_Infobip_SMS_Test_Mode.ts:563:14)

steps.name: the test mode configuration should be logged

elements.name: TC02 - Test Mode Message Limiting (Default 5)

steps.name: Infobip test data for "TC02" with 10 messages and test mode enabled
the batch is submitted to the communication module
only 5 messages should be sent to test phones
5 messages should be logged but not sent

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Expected 5 messages to be logged but not sent

10 !== 5

    + expected - actual

    -10
    +5

    at KredosWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/asliates/Desktop/KredosAI/testing-feature-test_automation_scripts/KredosApplication/automation/tests/steps/Comm_Module/DEV_928/DEV_928_Infobip_SMS_Test_Mode.ts:619:16)

elements.name: TC03 - Custom Message Limit Setting

steps.name: Infobip test data for "TC03" with 10 messages and test mode limit of 3
the batch is submitted to the communication module
only 3 messages should be sent to test phones
7 messages should be logged but not sent

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Expected 7 messages to be logged but not sent

10 !== 7

    + expected - actual

    -10
    +7

    at KredosWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/asliates/Desktop/KredosAI/testing-feature-test_automation_scripts/KredosApplication/automation/tests/steps/Comm_Module/DEV_928/DEV_928_Infobip_SMS_Test_Mode.ts:619:16)

elements.name: TC04 - Small Batch Handling (Fewer Than Limit)

steps.name: Infobip test data for "TC04" with 3 messages and test mode enabled
the batch is submitted to the communication module
all 3 messages should be sent to test phones

result.error_message:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: Expected 3 messages to be sent, but got 0

0 !== 3

    + expected - actual

    -0
    +3

    at KredosWorld.<anonymous> (/Users/asliates/Desktop/KredosAI/testing-feature-test_automation_scripts/KredosApplication/automation/tests/steps/Comm_Module/DEV_928/DEV_928_Infobip_SMS_Test_Mode.ts:641:16)

steps.name: 0 messages should be logged but not sent

the message should be sent to the default test phone number

name: Infobip SMS Channel Test Mode

description:
As a developer
  I want to be able to switch all customers from one SMS provider to another
  So that I can easily manage SMS integrations

elements.name: Default flag setting uses Twilio for SMS

steps.name: the global SMS channel flag is set to "Twilio"
I send an SMS message for a standard customer
the message should be routed to "Twilio"
the response should indicate successful message acceptance

elements.name: Switching flag to Infobip routes all SMS through Infobip

steps.name: the global SMS channel flag is set to "Infobip"
I send an SMS message for a standard customer
the message should be routed to "Infobip"
the response should indicate successful message acceptance

elements.name: BNE channel is used for T-Mobile regardless of global flag (Twilio setting)

steps.name: the global SMS channel flag is set to "Twilio"
I send an SMS message for "T-Mobile" customer
the message should be routed to "BNE"
the response should indicate successful message acceptance

elements.name: BNE channel is used for T-Mobile regardless of global flag (Infobip setting)

steps.name: the global SMS channel flag is set to "Infobip"
I send an SMS message for "T-Mobile" customer
the message should be routed to "BNE"
the response should indicate successful message acceptance

elements.name: Invalid global SMS channel flag value

steps.name: the global SMS channel flag is set to "Invalid"
I send an SMS message for a standard customer
the response should indicate "400 Bad Request" for global SMS flag
the error message should contain "Invalid SMS channel"

elements.name: Changing flag impacts USCC messages

steps.name: the global SMS channel flag is set to "Infobip"
I send an SMS message for "USCC" customer
the message should be routed to "Infobip"
the response should indicate successful message acceptance

elements.name: Changing flag impacts all non-T-Mobile customers

steps.name: the global SMS channel flag is set to "Infobip"
I send an SMS message for "NewCustomer" customer
the message should be routed to "Infobip"
the response should indicate successful message acceptance

elements.name: Missing global SMS channel flag defaults to Twilio

steps.name: the global SMS channel flag is not set
I send an SMS message for a standard customer
the message should be routed to "Twilio"
the response should indicate successful message acceptance

description:
As a developer
  I want to control whether to use RCS or SMS at the customer level
  So that customers can choose their preferred messaging channel

elements.name: T-Mobile customer always uses BNE regardless of tryRCS flag (true)

steps.name: customer "T-Mobile" has tryRCS flag set to "true"
I send a message to any device
the message should be delivered through "SMS" via "BNE"
for customer RCS tests the response should indicate successful message acceptance

name: Customer Level RCS Flag

description:
As a developer
  I want to be able to send emails through the communication module
  So that I can communicate with customers via email

the email request is submitted to the communication module
the email should be processed successfully

the email request is submitted to the communication module
the response should indicate "400 Bad Request"

steps.name: email test data for "TC03"
the email request is submitted to the communication module
the response should indicate "Invalid email format"

name: Email Module as a Separate Service
